articles.author: Sarra Gray
articles.title: Measles outbreak: Adults warned of catching 'dangerous' illness as risks are higher in older people - GB News
articles.description: A fresh warning has been shared as cases of measles rise in the UK and across Europe at an "alarming rate".Doctors have warned adults may be more at risk than they realise of the contagious illness. The number of people contracting measles has increased by 20…
articles.content:
A fresh warning has been shared as cases of measles rise in the UK and across Europe at an "alarming rate".
Doctors have warned adults may be more at risk than they realise of the contagious illness… [+5598 chars]
